005
006package gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.model.xml;
007
008import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.MetapathException;
009import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.metapath.StaticContext;
010import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.model.AbstractLoader;
011import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.model.IConstraintLoader;
012import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.model.ISource;
013import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.model.MetaschemaException;
014import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.model.constraint.AssemblyConstraintSet;
015import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.model.constraint.AssemblyTargetedConstraints;
016import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.model.constraint.DefaultConstraintSet;
017import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.model.constraint.DefaultScopedContraints;
018import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.model.constraint.FieldTargetedConstraints;
019import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.model.constraint.FlagTargetedConstraints;
020import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.model.constraint.IConstraintSet;
021import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.model.constraint.IModelConstrained;
022import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.model.constraint.IScopedContraints;
023import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.model.constraint.ITargetedConstraints;
024import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.model.constraint.IValueConstrained;
025import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.model.constraint.ValueConstraintSet;
026import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.model.xml.impl.ConstraintXmlSupport;
027import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.model.xml.impl.XmlObjectParser;
028import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.model.xml.impl.XmlObjectParser.Handler;
029import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.model.xml.xmlbeans.METASCHEMACONSTRAINTSDocument;
030import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.model.xml.xmlbeans.METASCHEMACONSTRAINTSDocument.METASCHEMACONSTRAINTS.Scope;
031import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.util.CollectionUtil;
032import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.util.ObjectUtils;
033
034import org.apache.commons.lang3.tuple.Pair;
035import org.apache.xmlbeans.XmlCursor;
036import org.apache.xmlbeans.XmlException;
037import org.apache.xmlbeans.XmlObject;
038import org.apache.xmlbeans.XmlOptions;
039import org.apache.xmlbeans.impl.values.XmlValueNotSupportedException;
040
041import java.io.IOException;
042import java.net.URI;
043import java.util.Deque;
044import java.util.LinkedHashSet;
045import java.util.LinkedList;
046import java.util.List;
047import java.util.Map;
048import java.util.Set;
049
050import javax.xml.namespace.QName;
051
052import edu.umd.cs.findbugs.annotations.NonNull;
053
054/**
055 * Provides methods to load a constraint set expressed in XML.
056 * <p>
057 * Loaded constraint instances are cached to avoid the need to load them for
058 * every use. Any constraint set imported is also loaded and cached
059 * automatically.
060 */
061@SuppressWarnings("PMD.CouplingBetweenObjects")
062public class XmlConstraintLoader
063    extends AbstractLoader<List<IConstraintSet>>
064    implements IConstraintLoader {
065
066  @SuppressWarnings("PMD.UseConcurrentHashMap")
067  @NonNull
068  private static final Map<QName,
069      Handler<Pair<ISource, List<ITargetedConstraints>>>> SCOPE_OBJECT_MAPPING = ObjectUtils.notNull(
070          Map.ofEntries(
071              Map.entry(XmlModuleConstants.ASSEMBLY_QNAME, XmlConstraintLoader::handleScopedAssembly),
072              Map.entry(XmlModuleConstants.FIELD_QNAME, XmlConstraintLoader::handleScopedField),
073              Map.entry(XmlModuleConstants.FLAG_QNAME, XmlConstraintLoader::handleScopedFlag)));
074
075  @NonNull
076  private static final XmlObjectParser<Pair<ISource, List<ITargetedConstraints>>> SCOPE_PARSER
077      = new XmlObjectParser<>(SCOPE_OBJECT_MAPPING) {
078
079        @Override
080        protected Handler<Pair<ISource, List<ITargetedConstraints>>> identifyHandler(XmlCursor cursor, XmlObject obj) {
081          Handler<Pair<ISource, List<ITargetedConstraints>>> retval;
082          if (obj instanceof Scope.Assembly) {
083            retval = XmlConstraintLoader::handleScopedAssembly;
084          } else if (obj instanceof Scope.Field) {
085            retval = XmlConstraintLoader::handleScopedField;
086          } else if (obj instanceof Scope.Flag) {
087            retval = XmlConstraintLoader::handleScopedFlag;
088          } else {
089            throw new IllegalStateException(String.format("Unhandled element type '%s'.", obj.getClass().getName()));
090          }
091          return retval;
092        }
093
094      };
095
096  @Override
097  protected List<IConstraintSet> parseResource(@NonNull URI resource, @NonNull Deque<URI> visitedResources)
098      throws IOException {
099
100    // parse this metaschema
101    METASCHEMACONSTRAINTSDocument xmlObject = parseConstraintSet(resource);
102
103    // now check if this constraint set imports other constraint sets
104    int size = xmlObject.getMETASCHEMACONSTRAINTS().sizeOfImportArray();
105    Set<IConstraintSet> importedConstraints;
106    if (size == 0) {
107      importedConstraints = CollectionUtil.emptySet();
108    } else {
109      try {
110        importedConstraints = new LinkedHashSet<>();
111        for (METASCHEMACONSTRAINTSDocument.METASCHEMACONSTRAINTS.Import imported : xmlObject.getMETASCHEMACONSTRAINTS()
112            .getImportList()) {
113          URI importedResource = URI.create(imported.getHref());
114          importedResource = ObjectUtils.notNull(resource.resolve(importedResource));
115          importedConstraints.addAll(loadInternal(importedResource, visitedResources));
116        }
117      } catch (MetaschemaException ex) {
118        throw new IOException(ex);
119      }
120    }
121
122    // now create this constraint set
123    return CollectionUtil.singletonList(new DefaultConstraintSet(
124        resource,
125        parseScopedConstraints(xmlObject, resource),
126        importedConstraints));
127  }
128
129  /**
130   * Parse the provided XML resource as a Metaschema constraints.
131   *
132   * @param resource
133   *          the resource to parse
134   * @return the XMLBeans representation of the Metaschema contraints
135   * @throws IOException
136   *           if a parsing error occurred
137   */
138  @NonNull
139  private static METASCHEMACONSTRAINTSDocument parseConstraintSet(@NonNull URI resource) throws IOException {
140    try {
141      XmlOptions options = new XmlOptions();
142      options.setBaseURI(resource);
143      options.setLoadLineNumbers();
144      return ObjectUtils.notNull(METASCHEMACONSTRAINTSDocument.Factory.parse(resource.toURL(), options));
145    } catch (XmlException ex) {
146      throw new IOException(ex);
147    }
148  }
149
150  /**
151   * Parse individual constraint definitions from the provided XMLBeans object.
152   *
153   * @param xmlObject
154   *          the XMLBeans object
155   * @param resource
156   *          the resource containing the constraint content
157   * @return the scoped constraint definitions
158   */
159  @SuppressWarnings("PMD.AvoidInstantiatingObjectsInLoops") // intentional
160  @NonNull
161  protected List<IScopedContraints> parseScopedConstraints(
162      @NonNull METASCHEMACONSTRAINTSDocument xmlObject,
163      @NonNull URI resource) {
164    List<IScopedContraints> scopedConstraints = new LinkedList<>();
165
166    StaticContext.Builder builder = StaticContext.builder()
167        .baseUri(resource);
168
169    METASCHEMACONSTRAINTSDocument.METASCHEMACONSTRAINTS constraints = xmlObject.getMETASCHEMACONSTRAINTS();
170
171    constraints.getNamespaceBindingList().stream()
172        .forEach(binding -> builder.namespace(
173            ObjectUtils.notNull(binding.getPrefix()), ObjectUtils.notNull(binding.getUri())));
174
175    builder.useWildcardWhenNamespaceNotDefaulted(true);
176
177    ISource source = ISource.externalSource(builder.build());
178
179    for (Scope scope : constraints.getScopeList()) {
180      assert scope != null;
181
182      List<ITargetedConstraints> targetedConstraints = new LinkedList<>(); // NOPMD - intentional
183      try {
184        SCOPE_PARSER.parse(scope, Pair.of(source, targetedConstraints));
185      } catch (MetapathException | XmlValueNotSupportedException ex) {
186        if (ex.getCause() instanceof MetapathException) {
187          throw new MetapathException(
188              String.format("Unable to compile a Metapath in '%s'. %s",
189                  source.getSource(),
190                  ex.getLocalizedMessage()),
191              ex);
192        }
193        throw ex;
194      }
195
196      URI namespace = ObjectUtils.notNull(URI.create(scope.getMetaschemaNamespace()));
197      String shortName = ObjectUtils.requireNonNull(scope.getMetaschemaShortName());
198
199      scopedConstraints.add(new DefaultScopedContraints(
200          namespace,
201          shortName,
202          CollectionUtil.unmodifiableList(targetedConstraints)));
203    }
204    return CollectionUtil.unmodifiableList(scopedConstraints);
205  }
206
207  private static void handleScopedAssembly( // NOPMD false positive
208      @NonNull XmlObject obj,
209      Pair<ISource, List<ITargetedConstraints>> state) {
210    Scope.Assembly assembly = (Scope.Assembly) obj;
211
212    IModelConstrained constraints = new AssemblyConstraintSet();
213    ConstraintXmlSupport.parse(constraints, assembly, ObjectUtils.notNull(state.getLeft()));
214
215    state.getRight().add(new AssemblyTargetedConstraints(
216        ObjectUtils.requireNonNull(assembly.getTarget()),
217        constraints));
218  }
219
220  private static void handleScopedField( // NOPMD false positive
221      @NonNull XmlObject obj,
222      Pair<ISource, List<ITargetedConstraints>> state) {
223    Scope.Field field = (Scope.Field) obj;
224
225    IValueConstrained constraints = new ValueConstraintSet();
226    ConstraintXmlSupport.parse(constraints, field, ObjectUtils.notNull(state.getLeft()));
227
228    state.getRight().add(new FieldTargetedConstraints(
229        ObjectUtils.requireNonNull(field.getTarget()),
230        constraints));
231  }
232
233  private static void handleScopedFlag( // NOPMD false positive
234      @NonNull XmlObject obj,
235      Pair<ISource, List<ITargetedConstraints>> state) {
236    Scope.Flag flag = (Scope.Flag) obj;
237
238    IValueConstrained constraints = new ValueConstraintSet();
239    ConstraintXmlSupport.parse(constraints, flag, ObjectUtils.notNull(state.getLeft()));
240
241    state.getRight().add(new FlagTargetedConstraints(
242        ObjectUtils.requireNonNull(flag.getTarget()),
243        constraints));
244  }
245}
